metadata.title: CVE-2023-46586 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
cgi.c in weborf .0.17, 0.18, 0.19, and 0.20 (before 1.0) lacks '\0'termination of the path for CGI scripts because strncpy is misused.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46586` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qweborf - 1.0-1build2
weborf - 1.0-1build2
weborf-daemon - 1.0-1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: weborf package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0-1build2').
